author: SomeOrdinaryGamers
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at how one of the most popular games, ARC raiders has gained such a cult following for being an amazing game. This game however contains elements of generative AI that has sparked boycotts even and it's time to see just how controversial it is and what the future of this tech is going to look like. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Huge ARC Raiders Controversy...
